com.aurel.track.itemNavigator.layout.column

Class ColumnFieldsBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.itemNavigator.layout.column.ColumnFieldsBL

  • public class ColumnFieldsBL
extends java.lang.Object
    Logic for configuring the layout columns independently of a concrete layout
